header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, anecdote telling, making arrangements

body.u: I went to the doctors and told him about my penis
told them about your penis
did actually say I've got kind of a bulge a little little penis going on
what did he say?
he was laughing I was like I'm allowed to laugh you shouldn't be laughing he was like come on then let's measure your penis
whoa mad

so we had a bit of a measure up and he was like okay he said I don't mean to worry you but if it doesn't go down keep an eye on it and if it doesn't go down in a week you'll have to go to hospital and have it drained he said it should have gone down by now
shit yeah
keep icing it might just take an extra few days you know you did bruise it quite badly so
mm yeah
Don't work about it yet
but please come back if it doesn't go down
so it's all liquidy
it's blood it's a pouch of blood
oh mate that's gross is it pus and blood?
's coming
where?
it's pus and blood here to drop off my boxes that's it
he's dropping off boxes
yes which I said I would go get but I said no you don't have to drop them oh well I'm passing anyway he's clearly not passing where would he pass to?
drop and roll
drop and roll he's had one reply messages he can drop and roll right on by
he needs to drop and roll
yeah
have you see your dad sent you a birthday card?
have I what?
your dad sent you a birthday card
no
your dad is bloody keen it's more than a month in advance
ah look a little teddy
ah isn't he cute
can I open it now? I'll tell him I've not opened it yet
no you can't open it now look what it says can you not read?
aw it's like a month and a half in advance how far way does he think I live?
Down south the post is shit down south
yeah down south you need a passport you need a passport to go there oh bless him put it up where the other one was
keep it safe keep it secret keep it safe
okay
gently does it
no no okay then
ready okay like totally freak me out My brain feels like it's about to fall out of my ears
is this beth dead? Beth dead? Bed death
bed death yeah I think it's what I had before because every time I move my head I get a spitting pain so that's interesting
holy shitters

I went into the cupboard to try and get a book out today and my head felt like it was about to fall off on it's hinge so that was a bit intense so obviously I drove to work drove very slowly home from work and I was going to the movies with but I told him I couldn't go and also he wanted to go to some Indian buffet to eat we were trying to it will be rank so I didn't want to go and also my brain is going to fall out I did warn him that I'd taken all the drugs again so
all the drugs

he said right I'm going to write myself a post-it note to call you later cos I think you might die cos you've taken all the drugs and I was like okay where are you going to put it? In a peculiar place and I was like don't put it in a peculiar place cos you'll never find it Put it on the kettle he was like alright
no he might not get as far as the kettle put it in the cup
just pre warning is coming round to drop some boxes off
ah
is he coming in?
that's all I'm hoping not if he stands around as if he's going to come in then he'll can come and sit in the kitchen he's not going in my room
mm
certainly not
hanging around like a bad smell
yeah fuck right off
jordie porge jordie podge
he can fuck off I'm hungry I don't know what to ta what to do for tea today
can we blink and magic some food
I just fish and chipped it
I thought it smelled of chips in here it's not working think harder are you thinking of roast chicken with all the trimmings
yeah well actually I started to think about roast chicken with all the trimmings then I thought of bacon sandwich then I thought of Chinese noodles in curry sauce so all of those together
I need all of those
all of them
I mainly just need squash I think actually to begin as a starter
no oh yeah I'll get the apple juice out my room
where has the glass gone? Are you seeing tonight?
no I thought about it
no? Have a night off
I don't want to see her tonight to be quite honest I really don't
little rest
I've had such a tough day that my body is just shot em I'm going to be seeing a lot of her over the weekend as well
is she coming out on? What day are you going out for 's birthday?
Saturday saturday so I'm round there Friday night anyway cos she's got to be with the kids
Are they with their dad this weekend?
yeah
well that's good
so I will be spending my first night there well first official night anyway
first official night in a bed well that sounds quite exciting
mm
and then out with her on Saturday night?
yeah and she probably won't allow me in her house when we come home
fair enough fair enough
I don't care to be quite honest it's probably a good thing cos I've got coming round Sunday morning to do the banana challenge I'm getting picked up at half eleven on Sunday morning
you're going to die you're already dead
so the banana challenge has to be done early
ah I might vomit though if I see you vomiting
I'm going to need a cameraman though
I'll can cameraman
do you mind me waking you up then?
what time?
well whenever I'm going to want to get showered afterwards so ten o'clock at the latest
ten o'clock on a Sunday
you can go to bed afterwards
Cos I'm going out for mothering Sunday
oh yeah all you normal people with mothers hi
I need some in my life
some?
oh and I'm seeing my friend he's come up from Reading and oh is going to sort my back out for me
is just coming for the day?

mm well he's going home to see his mum for mothering Sunday and he was going to come here on Saturday and I was like the only fucking Saturday I have to work and that's the one Saturday he can get by here what are the fucking chances?
that's a bit shit
and I was like no I really want to see you
but he can But he can come during the day and mooch about and then you can see him in the evening he can stay here I the evening can he?
no cos he'll have to be he's got to be in Kent to see his mum for Sunday
oh his mum lives in Kent
yeah so he's going Reading Cambridge Kent
that's mental
yeah
so
can he not drive on Sunday though to Kent? Sunday morning?
Sunday morning? Yeah probably but I finish work at eight half eight after doing the best part of a ten hour shift it's not going to be pretty
ooh that's bad timing
are you not showing your face Saturday night then?
probably not I'll probably be dead
yeah I didn't think you would be yeah I don't blame you to be quite honest not with that thing
the peno
you look like a drag queen or a drag king
drag king and ten hour shift is just going to be a killer so he may call on the way back from seeing his mum or if he can fit it in
who's this?
my friend
the friend
no no went to uni with him long time lived in Italy with him yeah it's just like me but a boy which is a bit weird yeah pretty much
there's two of you out there
quite bad
let loose on the public

yeah but he just split up with his boyfriend but they're still living together and is the one that supposed to be moving out and he's not moving anywhere and I thought I can't imagine anything worse than that
oh no is he refusing to move out?

no he's not refusing like the pair of them they're not like they're not stereotypically gay like l think I don't even know if 's parents know I don't know either way I knew and Samara knew but nobody else in the world knew part of them probably still don't know em and they got together he moved down to Reading for a job and was already there near there so he thought I'll let out my flat we'll move together but they had two bedrooms so it wasn't it's not like sharing a bedroom they've fallen out come to literal fisty cuffs a few times but it's you know 's job 's move just joined in so is the one to move and he keeps saying he's going to move out and it just never materialises so 's getting really fucked off which I can imagine he should have never been with him anyway was not good enough for at all he was annoying I told I was honest
no change no change there well if someone wants eggs there's three in there
we could make pancakes
ah yeah
shall we make pancakes?
is it a real hassle for you to make pancakes that's because you will probably need to make them I might cock them up what can we put in the pancakes?
well
I've got cheese
cheese sugar
cheese not not cheese and sugar
not cheese and sugar no
I've got lemon and treacle in there
lemon and treacle
I've got Nutella
I do this
this could be done

isn't it just flour? Is it milk?
flour one egg and milk isn't it? But we'd need to know the quantities
yeah we'll probably have to wait for to fuck off though might have starved by then he's supposed to be here now
well there is a car noise outside
mm have you got the key for the cupboard upstairs?
no
's got it
yeah
I need it I need somewhere to put these boxes
well you'll have to bite the bullet and just leave them in your room for a bit and I'll go and get the key back very very soon cos I'm going to need to get in there
it's like three four three I don't remember

so literally by the weekend I'll have it cos em well yeah that's where your heater is that's where my heater is but we don't need them anymore it's getting warmer and the heating is still on so we don't need them so Trudy can trust us that's the way I see it
yeah she's
I think it's appalling that she made you lock them in in the first place
I think it's appalling that she actually stole it out of my room
and she stole the key from my room
I'd forgotten about her actually stealing it fuck
there's still no telling if it's actually in the cupboard cos I haven't asked her all I know is the key is gone and I know has got it
yeah no she's got to have done it hasn't she let's be honest
no but she might have locked the cupboard and taken the heater with her
she would have put it in the cupboard I think that's where everybody else's is
I'm gonna text her on Friday to let her know if I've got some money for her or not
oh yeah I've got to pay the rent this week
if I have then I'll say make sure you bring the key to the cupboard please cos I need to get in there as well
ah I'm really not looking forward to this at all
maybe just stand in the doorway with him like don't let him cross the threshold
yeah get him to just put the boxes at the bottom of the stairs for now
no just say just say to him when he comes to the door make him fucking bring them in just say to him say I'm going out in a minute I'm going to the gym
he knows I'm not going anywhere with this shit
no just say you've got to make dinner you're making dinner got got the hob on he won't be able to see from there just stand in the doorway don't don't let him come in
just tell him drop and away
Cos otherwise he might not leave he might just stay for the night
mm I don't I don't think he will stay for the night but I don't I don't want to hear what he's got to say
just tell him that you ain't prepared to listen to him
just don't let him in you don't need to be mean
no just let make him take the hint that you don't want him in the house
yeah I'll close this middle door
yeah
close my bedroom door
just stand in the doorway
yeah stand by the door
or you know in the hall
yeah
yeah cos he can bring the boxes to the door you can move them into the hall and then just loiter there until he's done
yeah
how are they all going to fit in his car? Are they not very big boxes

no it's stuff that I don't use like there's maybe three boxes or four boxes mm there's nothing he can say that's going to make me want to talk to him or know him and I don't really care anymore to be honest it's just the way he's behaving now it isn't than I know it isn't that I want to know and if being around him now is going kind if make me think badly of when we were together which it is starting to you know I'm starting to think hang on I wanted to be a good person and take responsibility for things you know
yeah and you've been the mature person since you broke up you're the one who said look I'm sorry for this I'm sorry for that and
I except this and he hasn't done anything

no
he hasn't reflected at all he's put it all on you
and that just shows you exactly exactly how immature he is cos he's not he's not wanted to take that on board
yeah
and that's why we broke up because he was immature so I mean really it's quite reassuring to know that the decision I made back then was right
was the right one yeah
I was it was true for what I was thinking even though I was so close to the situation
that's it you got out at a good time really

yeah just not sure that anybody else is going to try and but I was saying to today at work the way the way he's being now I mean I don't believe for one minute that he's being malicious you know he just doesn't know me better and he just needs to grow up and learn that when he's got somebody to lean on who is going to come back in the pecking order and and say okay we'll do this and he's always going to have someone to do it for him and right now that someone has got to be me
and you can't keep making allowances for that
no you can't
you know he's an adult can't keep excusing his behaviour by saying he's immature you know he's got to stand on his own two feet you know

that's it he can't I mean he can't keep doing it it's only going to be worse or longer for him cos I'm going to get shit on he's never going to grow up just the next person that has to rely on him really

absolutely you have to worry about him starting a relationship so soon after one ending particularly a serious one because you don't have that period to reflect and look at yourself and look at how you were in a relationship you just lurch form one to the next to the next you never change you never grow

yeah
and this well I mean it's his problem isn't it not mine or ours
